biotools.summary: Analysing complex metagenomic data with MicroWineBar | MicroWineBar is a graphical tool for analysing metagenomic sequencing samples | MicroWineBar was designed for species abundance tables from shotgun metagenomics data but can also be used for other types of hierarchical data. The tab-delimited files contain absolute and/or relative abundances with taxonomic annotations (or other hierarchical data). As MicroWineBar is not tight to any specific program which generates species abundance tables, one needs to prepare the input:
